/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene contrast to the busy scene below.
